---
title: The Right Door
author: ''
date: '2022-10-25'
slug: the_right_door
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $4.6M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with The Right Door. The average
  contract duration was 0.85 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $141.6K. The longest
  contract was 3.95 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.3M.
lookup_name: 'THE RIGHT DOOR'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '4.6M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '166'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '58'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '35%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '98%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.31'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '6.9M'
s424_mean_duration: '0.85'
s421_mean_contract_value: '141.6K'
s425_max_duration: '3.95'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.3M'
---
